page.title: 10TOWARD FARM FARMS
page.content:
Mr.Iain Mundell with his brother Mr.David Mundell runs a beef farm called "Toward Farm". They have 182 hectares,many of which are under grass for animal grazing as well as growing Hay and Silage for Winter feed. {Amount of LIVESTOCK: 90 Cows 90 Calves 12 Heifers 03 Bulls 420 Lambs 350 Sheep
For storage they own three big sheds and a byre.For working in the fields Mr.& Mr.Mundell own: 03 Tractors 01 Forage harvester 01 Combine harvester 01 Turbo mower
Mr.Iain Mundell enjoys farming in that he likes very much working with animals. {By Jennifer Benson. {=====================
